title: Using Foundation Models to Prescribe Patients Proper Antibiotics
details: SA Lee, H Halperin, Y Halperin, T Brokowski… - 2025
abstract: The rise of antibiotic-resistant bacteria presents a significant global health threat by reducing the effectiveness of essential treatments. This study evaluates the potential of clinical decision support systems powered by biomedical language foundation …

title: Machine reading comprehension based named entity recognition for medical text
details: Z Zhang, X Zheng, J Zhang - Multimedia Tools and Applications, 2025
abstract: Abstract Electronic Medical Record (EMR) has been widely utilized in disease prevention, clinical diagnosis and scientific research. EMR mining based on Named Entity Recognition (NER) has become a research hotspot in the healthcare field …
